Training.title: Two Year Technical Degree
Training.option: in Digital System IT & Network option
content: Create Windows Forms app with C#, understand agile methods, learning to work in a team to deliver a project from zero.
I learned basics of algorithms, basics of C, C++ & learned C#.

Training.title: Professional Certificate in Web and Mobile Development
content: Beginning with Figma to create our UI/UX Designs
Learning all basics of front web development with HTML, CSS, Javascript.
Discover my first front web framework VueJS
The second part of my training is back-end development with PHP and SQL for my database
In a second time I began working with Laravel and learn fundamentals about this stack.
I finished my training with NodeJS and MongoDB.

Internship.title: Internship at IEMN
Internship.location: @ Institute of Electronic, Microelectronic and Nanotechnologies - VILLENEUVE D'ASCQ 59491
Internship.option: Website development with Python and Flask microframework
content: Internship included in my web & mobile web developer training.
Development of a new style of form for access to IEMN buildings via Python with the microframework Flask
Modification of administration interfaces for the previous form (still with Flask)
